comments.body: Register a GPU kernel as well? That might require adding a .device() before the eigen call to .broadcast but otherwise should be easy.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +55,59 @@// As MakeShape is able to handle both DT_INT32 and DT_INT64,
// no need to have TypeConstraint for `Tidx`
#define REGISTER_KERNEL(type)                                           \
  REGISTER_KERNEL_BUILDER(                                              \
      Name("BroadcastTo").Device(DEVICE_CPU).TypeConstraint<type>("T"), \
